mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(case when (t.`status`=1 and ta.is_delete=0) then 2 end)as process, COUNT(case when ((t.`status`=2 or t.`status`=3) and ta.is_delete=0) then 1 end)as complete, COUNT(case when (ta.`status`=1 and ta.is_delete=0) then 2 end)as multi, SUM(case when (t.`status`=1 and ta.is_delete=0) then t.task_hours else 0 end) as hours, COUNT(case when (t.end_time<NOW() and t.status=1 and ta.is_delete=0) then 1 end)as delay, u.`name`,u.id as id from `user` u LEFT JOIN task_user t on t.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN task ta ON ta.id=t.task_id WHERE u.user_role>0 GROUP BY u.id
